CurrentFullCanvas module¶

OPENGUI CurrentFullCanvas module

The CurrentFullCanvas module is the main file for OPENGUI. From here, the gui window runs, and all of the subsidary modules are called from this module.

class CurrentFullCanvas.frameMain(parent)¶

Bases: wx._core.Frame

Main frame of the canvas. Container for all subframes.

OPENDocs(event)¶

Opens the OPEN documentation on the internal web viewer.

addColumn(event)¶

A column will be added to the data grid.

addRow(event)¶

A row will be added to the data grid.

branchSelect(event)¶

Populates the Asset table with the assets of the selected branch.

The actively selected branch of the energy system tree will have its active assets displayed on the active asset list.

changeActiveDirectory(event)¶

Changes the active directory of the file tree.

Opens the file explorer dialogue on the user’s computer and copies that path to the path of the file tree.

changeActiveFile(event)¶

Changes the selected file for import.

Takes the file selected by the user (via double-click) and marks the file as “selected”. The selected file’s path is then displayed in the status bar at the bottom of the canvas.

clearGrid(event)¶

The data grid will be cleared of all text.

createNewAsset(event)¶

Opens the dialogue for creating a new asset.

Once the items in the dialogue have been selected by the user, a new asset is selected and sent to the active asset list.

createNewMarket(event)¶

Creates a new Market Object.

Creates a Market Object with arbitrary default parameters.

listItemSelected(event)¶

Populates the parameter list with the parameters of the selected asset.

Whenever an asset (or object) is selected from the active assets list, its parameters will be displayed on the active asset parameters list.

loadData(event)¶

Loads data from selected file into the data grid.

refreshModels()¶
reportIssue(event)¶

Opens the GitHub “report an issue” page for OPENGUI.

runOPENTest(event)¶

Runs the building_test.py simulation.

Currently the only simulation interaction with OPEN.

saveData(event)¶

Saves the data in the grid as a .txt or .xml file, depending on user choice from a pop-up window.

shutDown(event)¶

Closes the application

updateCurves()¶

Prints the plots from OPEN simulation into the curves tab of the main canvas.

updateParams(event)¶

The parameters of an asset will be updated.

Whenever any parameter of an asset is edited in the active asset parameter list, the values will be refreshed and stored within the local memory.

videoTutorials(event)¶

Opens the video tutorials wep page in the user’s default browser.

OPENGUI
